Title: Commemorating the celebration of the International Day of Peace on September 21, 2021 and the display of The Peace Flag Project at the United Nations on the International Day of Peace on September 21, 2021
ActClause: LEGISLATIVE RESOLUTION commemorating the celebration of the International Day of Peace on September 21, 2021 and the display of The Peace Flag Project at the United Nations on the International Day of Peace on September 21, 2021
